net.antidot.api.search

Interface FacetValueHelperInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    IntervalFacetValueHelper, TreeFacetValueHelper

    public interface FacetValueHelperInterface
    Interface representing one facet value.

    You can get access to main data such as:

    • key used to filter on specific facet value,
    • label for better integration than simple key,
    • count of documents defining the facet value,
    • sub-facet values for hierarchical facets.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long getCount()
      Retrieves number of documents which defines this specific facet value.
      java.lang.String getKey()
      Retrieves key of the facet value.
      java.lang.String getLabel()
      Retrieves label of the facet value.
      java.util.List<FacetValueHelperInterface> getValues()
      Lists sub-values of this facet value.

    • Method Detail

      • getKey

        java.lang.String getKey()
        Retrieves key of the facet value. This key is used to filter on this specific facet value.
        Returns:
        key of the facet value.

      • getLabel

        java.lang.String getLabel()
        Retrieves label of the facet value. This label can be used instead of the key for a better web integration.

        If no label has been defined on PaF side, this method should return same result as getKey() method.

        Returns:
        label of the facet value.

      • getCount

        long getCount()
        Retrieves number of documents which defines this specific facet value.
        Returns:
        number of documents defining this facet value.

      • getValues

        java.util.List<FacetValueHelperInterface> getValues()
        Lists sub-values of this facet value. This list can be empty if sub-values are not applicable.
        Returns:
        sub-values of the facet value.
